title: SNIPER Digital Watch Face
summary: BL3CK FACE: Analog Digital Military Watch Face
description: A new face that combine ultraclear infos with design elements of professional military watch.Optimized for Round and Square watches (tested on LG GWatchR, LG GWatch, Asus ZenWatch, Moto360)Android Wear 5.0x CompliantWatch face features:★           ENDLESS CUSTOMIZATION★           Digital time★           Analog time★           Wear Digital battery indicator★           Phone Digital battery indicator★           12-24 H★           Customizable LCD colors (via companion app)★           Customizable CAMO colors (via companion app)★           Customizable FONT colors (via companion app)★           Date with month, day, year and week★           Day number★           Month number★           Minimal Dimmed mode to extreme battery save ★           Dimmed mode almost the same as normal viewMore•  Visit our exclusive Android Wear faces collection for Android Wear on the Play Store LINK DEV PLAYSTORE•  Please let us know if you like to have any other faces (analog, digital or both) to be added to our selection. Designed and crafted in Italy by Stefano&Riccardo
descriptionHTML:
A new face that combine ultraclear infos with design elements of professional military watch.
Optimized for Round and Square watches (tested on LG GWatchR, LG GWatch, Asus ZenWatch, Moto360)
Android Wear 5.0x Compliant

Watch face features:

★ ENDLESS CUSTOMIZATION

★ Digital time
★ Analog time
★ Wear Digital battery indicator
★ Phone Digital battery indicator
★ 12-24 H
★ Customizable LCD colors (via companion app)
★ Customizable CAMO colors (via companion app)
★ Customizable FONT colors (via companion app)
★ Date with month, day, year and week
★ Day number
★ Month number
★ Minimal Dimmed mode to extreme battery save
★ Dimmed mode almost the same as normal view

More
• Visit our exclusive Android Wear faces collection for Android Wear on the Play Store LINK DEV PLAYSTORE
• Please let us know if you like to have any other faces (analog, digital or both) to be added to our selection.
Designed and crafted in Italy by Stefano&Riccardo
comments: Great watch face Hi its really very good watch face but the* time * mostly stays hidden under notifications. Too see the time u need to pull down the notification. To fix this issue you can swap it with day and date ( upside down ) or its not fit for purpose. So here is the problem and solution.

Turns heads! Everywhere I go I get people asking me what watch I have. I have the LG-G Watch R work as black plastic watch band. With this watch face as well as the slick watch itself it's really a head turner. The watch face never lags and the information is always correct, unless it is disconnected from your phone then your phones battery information is not correct and the date can get a little off.. -SirO Reviews (reviewed on: LG-G Watch R) if you found this helpful, please thumb up this review
The best among many face I've tested. Thank you developer. Just one little detail to make it perfect. A little icon to notify when the mobile phone has any unread notification or calendar event.

Great face but lacks weather I like this face a lot but I don't care much for the week and day info. Please consider showing the weather instead. Also a change of the hands color should be nice including a second hand. Just a question about burn-in protection. I see no pixel shifting to prevent burn-in. Developer please reply :-)
This version does not work with the new Android Wear update
Not for Gear S2 Love the way it looks if it would only work on Gear S2. Could someone on the development team fix it for Samsung.
